mapper.insert: insert into mobile_detail (id, name, brand, platform, os_version, screen_size, device_id, client_id, udid, slave_id, status, ready_state, device_type, password, picture_url, location, last_check_time, heartbeat_last_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{osVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{screenSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slaveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readyState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastCheckTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{heartbeatLastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update mobile_detail set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, os_version = #{osVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, screen_size = #{screenSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, udid = #{udid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slave_id = #{slaveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ready_state = #{readyState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_url = #{pictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_check_time = #{lastCheckTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, heartbeat_last_time = #{heartbeatLastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, brand, platform, os_version, screen_size, device_id, client_id, udid, slave_id, status, ready_state, device_type, password, picture_url, location, last_check_time, heartbeat_last_time from mobile_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
